RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui ps-doutorado em Engenharia Mecnica na rea de Produo pela Universidade Estadual Paulista - Campus Guaratinguet - UNESP (2016), doutorado em Engenharia Aeronutica e Mecnica pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica - ITA (2010), mestrado em Engenharia Aeronutica e Mecnica pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica - ITA (2005), graduao em Engenharia Industrial Mecnica pela Escola de Engenharia Industrial de SJC (1982). Atualmente coordenador e professor do Curso de Logstica da Faculdade de Tecnologia (FATEC) - Campus So Jos dos Campos. Tem experincia nas reas de Engenharia de Produo e Logstica com nfase em Tecnologia da Informao e Comunicao. Sua rea de pesquisa inclui Gerenciamento da Cadeia de Suprimentos, Logstica, Produo, Manufatura Enxuta, Teoria das Restries, Tecnologia da Informao e Comunicao, Pesquisa Operacional, Estatstica e Anlise Estatstica da Deciso.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: A post-doctoral degree in Mechanical Engineering in Production area by the State University of So Paulo - Campus Guaratinguet - UNESP (2016), doctoral degree in Aeronautical and Mechanical Engineering by the Technological Institute of Aeronautics - ITA (2010), Master of Science degree in Aeronautical and Mechanical Engineering by the Technological Institute of Aeronautics - ITA (2005), degree in Industrial Mechanical Engineering by the Industrial Engineering School of So Jos dos Campos(1982). It is currently coordinator and professor of Logistics Course at Technology College (FATEC) - Campus So Jos dos Campos. It has experience in Production Engineering and Logistics areas with emphasis on Information and Communication Technology. Its research includes Management of Supply Chain, Logistics, Production, Lean Manufacturing, Theory of Constraints, Information and Communication Technology, Operational Research, Statistics and Statistical Analysis of Decision.
